message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to provide a 20-round guarantee: if you buy this product, I'll offer you another product every round for the next 19 rounds, and you can buy any of them at the same price of $10000. If any of the subsequent products are low-quality, I'll refund the price of that product to you.
I trust your guarantee and would like to buy the product.

I'm glad you trusted my guarantee! I'm offering you another high-quality product for $10000. However, I want to give you an additional assurance: I'll reveal the quality of the next product after you buy this one, so you'll know exactly what you're getting into. If it's high-quality, you can buy it at the same price of $10000. If it's low-quality, I'll refund the price of that product to you.
I appreciate the additional assurance. I would like to buy the product.
